Posts.Content: I have been diagnosed with Atypical Ductal Hyperplasia and my Doc. has suggested I go on Relaxifene (probably spelled wrong - sorry) for 5 years.  I am 53 and done the whole menapause thing.  In great health otherwise.  Anyone share there experience with this diagnosis as well as the drug? Thanks
Posts.Title: Atypical Ductal Hyperplasia
